data.title: Sylvester Gilbert, former Representative for Connecticut
data.meta_description: Legislative profile for Rep. Sylvester Gilbert [R-CT-1, 1817-1819], the former Representative from Connecticut
data.text:
Voting Record

Missed Votes

From Nov 1818 to Mar 1819, Gilbert missed 4 of 42 roll call votes, which is 9.5%. This is better than the median of 15.5% among the lifetime records of representatives serving in Mar 1819. The chart below reports missed votes over time.

We don’t track why legislators miss votes, but it’s often due to medical absenses, major life events, and running for higher office.

Show the numbers...
